posts.post_title: looking for t210-3s with orange borders and a t210-7 Kelly Mascot
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen
Looking to buy any of these that I mentioned in the subject line.  I'd pay very generously for a Morris or that Kelly Mascot in particular.  I'm also trying to see how far I can get with the t210-3 set by just collecting orange cards. Please let me know if any of you have any you'd consider parting with.  Any condition is welcome.  Thanks much!

Brian

posts.post_title: looking for t210-3s with orange borders and a t210-7 Kelly Mascot
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Brian McQueen

Need a lot of help with my Series 3 orange border set.  If you have any of these lying around, I'd be willing to buy or trade in your favor for the card.  Any condition is welcome.  Also, been looking for that t210-7 Kelly for a while too.   It's another card I'd pay generously for.  

Thanks in advance,
